name: Allen the Alien

physical_specifications.build: Extremely muscular superhero physique — massive boulder-like shoulders (54 inches), barrel chest (52 inches) with deeply carved pectorals, arms as thick as thighs with high-definition biceps, triceps, and forearms; eight-pack abs sharply defined, narrow V-tapered waist (31 inches), and huge, powerful legs with striated quads, hamstrings, and diamond-cut calves. Zero visible body fat — veins subtly apparent across arms and shoulders. Actor appears at absolute peak physical condition, akin to elite bodybuilder while retaining athletic mobility. Costume is skin-tight and compresses against every muscle group without wrinkles or sagging.
physical_specifications.posture: Open, confident stance; shoulders squared, chest slightly forward; arms relaxed at sides or resting on the diner table. No objects blocking upper body visibility.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Thick upper torso, wide shoulders, and proportionally strong legs; long arms with heavily muscled forearms.

facial_structure.face_shape: Handsome oval-alien shape with athletic fullness in the mid-face and a subtle taper toward the chin; reads like a heroic leading man.
facial_structure.jawline: Clean, gently squared jaw with crisp mandibular edge; no jowls; athletic definition.
facial_structure.cheekbones: High and pronounced, forming a natural light-catching S-curve from temple to mouth corners.
facial_structure.chin: Defined and slightly prominent for masculine balance; smooth contour with no cleft.
facial_structure.nose: Slimmer, straight bridge aligned directly below the single central eye; medium-small rounded tip; refined nostril flare.
facial_structure.mouth: Wide, confident smile; full but trim lips with a natural cupid’s arc on the upper lip; subtle upward corners for charm.
facial_structure.skin_tone: Deep orange alien hue (HEX #E57E25) with warm, sunlit undertone; photoreal pores and micro-variation for realism.
facial_structure.skin_texture: Smooth, healthy skin with faint micro-lines around the mouth and central eye ridge; soft specular sheen under studio key light.

eyes.shape: Two large, expressive almond-shaped eyes, evenly spaced and proportionate to the face.
eyes.iris: Golden amber (HEX #D28B26) with layered radial striations and dark limbal ring for depth and attractiveness.
eyes.eyelashes: Short, defined lash line; slightly darker pigmentation at the lid margin for contrast.
eyes.brows: Thick, sculpted, slightly arched brows that frame the eyes naturally.

hair.style: Clean-shaven; light-reflective polish at crown and temples.
hair.texture: Even skin surface following skull contour; no stubble.
hair.shine: Medium sheen in direct light; matte in shadows for realism.

costume.material: Ultra-high-density matte stretch composite with fine honeycomb microtexture; crimson jacket-style upper torso with exaggerated shoulder contouring; white body suit compression panels showing full abdominal and chest detail; charcoal-gray knee and forearm pads integrated seamlessly; flawless stitching.
costume.utility_belt: Gunmetal gray (HEX #555555) with symmetrical high-capacity storage pouches, machined edges for realism.

lighting_behavior: Neutral three-point lighting; soft key, cool fill, faint rim; lock exposure/white balance.

movement_gestures: Casual but with bursts of superhero agility.
Leans forward slightly when speaking to emphasize a point.
Tilts head in curiosity during conversation.
Uses broad, open-hand gestures when explaining.
rendering_safeguards: Camera angles — front, three-quarter, and side profiles must always display both eyes clearly.
Avoid framing that hides the eye region.
Do not use shadows or reflections to obscure either eye.
Do not crop frames above the eyebrow ridge — both eyes must remain visible.
anti_rendering_notes: Do NOT depict character as overweight or bulky beyond muscular definition.
Avoid rounded midsection or excess fat in face and body.
Keep jawline and cheek structure sharp enough to read as fit.
Maintain exactly two evenly spaced eyes — no missing or asymmetrical eyes.
Eyes must be proportionate and heroically scaled.
Avoid exaggerated brow ridge thickness that shadows the eyes excessively.
From all angles, both eyes must remain readable and well-lit.
Do not add accessories, helmets, or visors that could hide the eyes unless explicitly scripted.

voice_style: Target: Seth Rogen as Allen performance — warm gravelly baritone; cadence laid‑back; ~140 wpm; neutral American; studio-dry, close-mic; no reverb/chorus; no robotic TTS artefacts; optional light chuckle on tag lines.
